resources.string: DAILY SCHEDULE FOR HOME ISOLATION FOR MILD COVID PATIENTS\n (NOT A SUBSTITUTE FOR DOCTOR’S ADVICE)

Check temperature
 
Check Oxygen SpO2 saturation levels using an oxymeter (if below 94%, consult a doctor)
 
Take one tablet of Pantoprazole 40mg
 
(any brand for example Pan) with water
 
Gargle with Chlorhexidine or salt water

Steam inhalation (preferably with the green capsule, any brand)
 
Gargle with Chlorhexidine or salt water.
 
(Only if recommended by a doctor) Azithromycin 500mg.
 
Vitamin ‘C’ tablet (any brand, Limcee is one of them).
 
Zinc and Multi-vitamin tablets (any brand, Zincovit is one of them)
 
Paracetamol (if fever or aches, available in many brands e.g. Dolo, Calpol, Crocin, Paracip)
 
Any other medicine recommended post breakfast by the doctor.
 
Take a fruit (coconut water cheekoo/sapota, apple, any fruit that you like)

Check temperature
 
Take the 6 minutes walk test (walk for 6 minutes normally, check oxygen SpO2 saturation levels before and after the walk (if below 94%, consult a doctor immediately). If you can’t do the 6 minutes walk, check oxygen normally.
 
Lunch
 
Vitamin ‘D3’ (any brand, for example- Uprise) ONLY ONCE A WEEK. Not more than ONCE A WEEK.
 
 Any other medicine post lunch advised by doctor.

Rest adequately
 
Steam inhalation (preferably with the green capsule, any brand)
 
Drink Karha/Kahwa (Kashmiri Tea)/ any warm beverage if Kahwa not available.
 
Vitamin ‘C’ tablet (any brand, Limcee is one of them)

Check Temperature.
 
Check Oxygen SpO2 saturation levels using an oxymeter (If below 94% consult a doctor immediately).
 
Drink coconut water.
 
Vitamin ‘C’ tablet (any brand, Limcee is one of them).
 
Paracetamol (If fever or aches, available in many brands e.g. Dolo, Calpol, Crocin, Paracip)

Steam inhalation (preferably with the green capsule, any brand).
 
Gargle with chlorhexidine or salt water.
 
Have a soup.

Check temperature
 
Check oxygen SpO2 saturation levels using an oxymeter (If below 94% consult a doctor immediately)
 
Dinner
 
Paracetamol (if fever or aches, available in many brands e.g. Dolo, Calpol, Crocin, Paracip)

Check temperature.
 
Check oxygen SpO2 saturation levels using an oxymeter (if below 94% consult a doctor immediately)
 
Steam inhalation (preferably with the green capsule, any brand)
 
Any warm drink (Milk with Haldi (turmeric) or karha (kadha) or hot water)
 
Congratulate yourself on following this routine.
 
Write a diary, speak with friends, listen to music, make a vacation plan for the next 2 year - do anything else you like to do
 
Be grateful and sleep with a positive attitude.
